main event: On May 4, 1967, a teacher and 13 students observed a circular, white object hovering in the sky in Euclid, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was circular, white, and estimated to be 70 to 100 feet in diameter., The sighting occurred around midday with clear skies., The object hovered about 70 feet from the ground and was seen at a distance of 250 yards., It was reported to be stationary for about 23 seconds before disappearing., Sounds resembling metallic or glass-like qualities were noted during the observation.
sighted object: a circular white object resembling half a surfboard
witness description: A teacher and 13 students at Euclid Senior High School
